description:
You’ll love my place because it's a quiet top 7th fl apt, elevator, east/south sun exposure with windows in every room, comfy queen-size bed in a bedroom with french-doors into the living-room, ceiling fan in the living room and bedroom, spacious closets & full bathroom. 

View over Jackie Robinson Park. 24/7 deli downstairs. Pharmacy, grocery store, laundromat, dry-cleaning, bank, and liquor store in the same block. At entrance of subway ABCD. 2 stops to Columbus Circle or 3 to Times Sq.
name: Top 7th floor sunny 1 bedroom - Sugar Hill, Harlem
review: This place was one of the highlights of my stay in NY. Although I will write a longer review when home, the apartment was great and Andres was attentive to all my needs.
